Package edu.mscd.cs.javaln.syslog

Class Summary
CLIFormatter Format a message so that it is acceptable to the UNIX command line interface "logger" command.
CLIHandler  
SyslogdFormatter  
SyslogdHandler Send a message to syslogd listening to the UDP port (typically 514) on a host (typically localhost)
